page.title: 08HOME LIFE IN PULBOROUGH.
page.content: At weekends I often go to my Gran's to go shopping. When I get home,I go for a bike-ride with my flashy bike, or go bird-watching in my new boots.Later on I watch T.V. or I may go swimming. I often do some gardening. Then I play Barbies!I usually go to Sunday School. (Naomi) I get out of bed, And shake my head, I eat my breakfast, Milk with cornflakes, I play a computer game, They are always the same, I'll play outside, Or go for a ride, I ride to the common, Every so often, I play with my friends, Then morning ends, I have my lunch, MUNCH,MUNCH,MUNCH. (David)
